The rooms are very nice and quiet and the hotel restaurant has very good food. The Hotel location is set amongst a vast variety of restaurant and bars. I would like to thank Mr. Alper Ozturk and his team for another excellent stay at this fine hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Certainly one of the best boutique Hotels in Istanbul at any price!”
Reviews.Author: jban99
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent new boutique Hotel with a great location, set in the middle of a block full of restaurants and only steps away for Sultanahmet main attractions. All the staff members were very cordial and always ready to assist us. A 5 stars recommendation and a good reason to return to Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Beyond any imaginable expectations! Just excellent!”
Reviews.Author: MarcoOfFlorence
Reviews.Content: Me and my friend spent 5 nights at the Millennium Suites, Istanbul. Besides its unbeatable location - just a few steps to Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia, Topkapy, etc, - the hotel has a very welcomed homy feelings, thanks to its manager Alpert and all his staff, that did whatever it took to make our staying memorable. The room was great, meaning spacious, clean, well appointed, and so was the bathroom. I could write more about this hotel, but I think I got my message across. All things considered I would go back there without any hesitation!! Thank you Alpert and all of the friends at Millennium Suites!

Reviews.Title: “Just like home”
Reviews.Author: BeirutNada
Reviews.Content: We had a stay of very enjoyable 3 days with hosts very friendly and helpful. Clean, tidy and very convenient to see all the amazing sites of old city.

Reviews.Title: “Just perfect!”
Reviews.Author: mariger3
Reviews.Content: One of the best located hotels in town, two minutes walk from all major landmarks and monuments. The rooms are large and very clean, nicely decorated. the service was amongst the best we've ever seen in a hotel (very kind, very friendly, very helpfull and all this without being fake). Small and cosy hotel, that we recommend without hesitation. Only draw back that the matress was abit too soft for our taste. Theodore & Maria, Greece

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel in incredible location”
Reviews.Author: MelissaMfromNYC
Reviews.Content: I cannot recommend this hotel strongly enough. The rooms are extremely clean and spacious, with a "Turkish" decor, which I loved. The bathrooms appear new and are also extremely clean. My room had a door to a balcony which had a small table outside, which was a wonderful addition. The location of the hotel is literally perfect. You are a short walking distance from every major attraction. The hotel staff is extremely helpful is directing you to anywhere you might want to go, and happy to suggest sights that might be of interest. The hotel itself is on a lively street with lots of cute restaurants and shops. There is a pretty restaurant in the bottom of the hotel where you can eat (including the free breakfast). I had no issues with noise at all in my room and the beds were very comfortable. The manager said that while a guest stays in his hotel, it their your home - and they mean it! I had trouble with some last minute travel arrangements I needed to make, and I cannot tell you the lengths the owner went to to assist me. He was incredibly gracious, patient and kind. In addition, the staff was beyond friendly and helpful. I left feeling as though I had truly made new friends. The pricing on this hotel is incredible for what you get - location, size and cleanliness of rooms, impeccable service. I would stay here again without hesitation and wish I had stronger words to recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel”
Reviews.Author: Simona-sis
Reviews.Content: Millennium Suites is a great oriental hotel. Intimacy and luxury are the best words to describe it. The bathroom is enormous, the bed and the entire room is magnificent. I will surely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to Stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Hamid_tariq
Reviews.Content: We had and excellent and memorable stay at the Millimium Suites. Amongst the things we liked most were the Rooms (large and comfortable), staff (which was extremely helpful and effecient) and the location (2 minutes walk from Topkapi, Blue Mosque, Aya Sophia etc. The hotel Manager Mr. Alper is very kind and helpful. He arranged most of our tours as well as offered us best promotions and useful tips for shopping. I will never forget his timely support in returning our baby stroller to the airport which we were about to loose. Highly reccommended for visitors

Reviews.Title: “Great and new find, yet hardly discovered by many”
Reviews.Author: vid76
Reviews.Content: When we booked Millenium, there were hardly any reviews so we took our chances. And what a great find! Firstly, the location is excellent if you wish to be near all the sites in the Old City Sultanahmet - such as Topkapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, hamams etc. Everything is within walking distance. Secondly, the hotel is situated in a quaint street that is lined with restaurants so you are spoiled for choice. The street has a nice, intimate feel to it and comes alive at night. Thirdly, the room itself is spacious (rare in Istanbul) with a big comfortable bed and large TV with English channels. I thought it was fantastic value for money. The bathroom is big too - the only tiny glitch is that the shower has no curtain, so the bathroom floor gets wet all the time. This can easily be rectified, however. The breakfast, while simple, is filling and similar to what you would get in most hotels in Turkey. Finally, the staff are excellent - gentle-mannered and helpful. They always made us feel at home and attended to any request we had. It was with regret that we left. We would definitely recommend Millenium Suites to anyone travelling to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a gem!”
Reviews.Author: JennieUK10
Reviews.Content: This little hotel was such a great find. It's situated in the heart of the Sultanahmet's restaurant area, the rooms could easily be mistaken for 5 star and the staff were incredibly helpful, friendly and professional. It would be my first choice on any return trip to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Mario1143
Reviews.Content: Everything in the hotel was just brilliant. A very good service, the bedrooms were very clean. I have bronchitis and mostly I get sick when I stay in a hotel that's not cleaned well, however I haven't become sick in this hotel at all! Conclusion: The hotel is clean, has excellent staff that treats you like a king, and mostly I've had the holiday of my life!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, location and service”
Reviews.Author: rejclarke
Reviews.Content: When I booked this hotel there were no reviews as they had just opened, however the photos looked great as did the location. The reception staff were fantastic and the room was perfect. Really large, well decorated, great view from large french windows that open out onto the street below. You cannot hear noise from below at all despite there being restaurants below. The beds were really comfortable and great shower. Nothing was too difficult for the staff who were able to help with every request. The location was ideal, a short walk to the Blue Mosque and other sights and a huge variety of restaurants and cafes, alalthough the food looked amazing at the restaurant onsite, we didn't have a chance to eat there. Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: danielvranceanu
Reviews.Content: - good quality and big rooms; - modern and comfortable

HotelInfo.Name: Millennium Suites
HotelInfo.Address: Akbiyik Street No:42 | Sultanahmet-The Old City, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
